name: Square-Route²
description:
Square-Route² is a challenging puzzle game! With over 60 levels!

Have fun!

INSTRUCTIONS:

  • Use the arrow keys to move /  swipes on mobile devices.
  • To clear a level, land on each tile once, but you can't cross your own path.
  • White tiles must be landed on twice.
  • To restart touch or click twice on you
  • To return to home, touch with 3 fingers on the screen / do right click twice on the screen

CREDITS:

Programming: Winbilip Studios

Music: neBSounds

Inspired by: Meap77

Text font: Pya Wai
